Verba Software | Software Engineer | San Francisco | ONSITE, SALARY:100-150k | https://www.verbasoftware.com/

Verba Software tackles textbook affordability through radical transparency. We work with more than 350 colleges and universities of all sizes to reach over 3.1 million students each term, with software for students, professors and bookstores. Our success means we need to grow and we’re looking for talented engineers.

We work in a beautiful exposed-brick office two blocks west of Union Square in Downtown San Francisco. We are a small, open and friendly company. We currently use Ruby, Javascript, ES6 and Coffeescript, and layer on Rails, React, Backbone, Node, MySQL, AWS, and Chef, but we’re always open to using the best tech.

Please email resumes to jobs@verbasoftware.com . Thanks!
